challenge.title: Jean Kilbourne - Still Killing Us Softly - Advertising's Image of Women
challenge.description: Jean Kilbourne's Still Killing Us Softly - Advertising's Image of Women is a lecture exploring the advertising industry's relationship to women compared to its overt sexism and misogyny.
challenge.instructions: Watch Jean Kilbourne's Still Killing Us Softly - Advertising's Image of Women on Archive.org.
